scripts.linkedin-parallel: concurrently -n "comment,explore" -c "blue,green" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-comment npm run linkedin-comment" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-explore npm run linkedin-message-explore"
scripts.linkedin-all: concurrently -n "comment,explore,reply" -c "blue,green,yellow" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-comment npm run linkedin-comment" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-explore npm run linkedin-message-explore" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-reply npm run linkedin-message-reply"
scripts.linkedin-engagement: concurrently -n "comment,explore" -c "blue,green" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-comment npm run linkedin-comment" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-explore npm run linkedin-message-explore"
scripts.linkedin-messaging: concurrently -n "explore,reply" -c "green,yellow" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-explore npm run linkedin-message-explore" "cross-env SESSION_NAME=linkedin-reply npm run linkedin-message-reply"
